DomainData.MainInfoText: Unapotembelea tovuti yoyote, inaweza kuhifadhi au kupata habari kwenye kivinjari chako, hasa kwa njia ya kuki. Habari hii inaweza kuwa juu yako, mapendekezo yako au kifaa chako na hutumiwa zaidi kufanya tovuti ifanye kazi kama unavyotarajia. Habari hiyo kwa kawaida haikutambui moja kwa moja, lakini inaweza kukupa uzoefu zaidi wa wavuti. Kwa sababu tunaheshimu haki yako ya faragha, unaweza kuchagua kutoruhusu aina fulani za biskuti. Bofya kwenye vichwa vya kategoria tofauti ili kujua zaidi na kubadilisha mipangilio yetu chaguo-msingi. Hata hivyo, kuzuia baadhi ya aina ya cookies inaweza kuathiri uzoefu wako wa tovuti na huduma sisi ni uwezo wa kutoa.
DomainData.AlertNoticeText: Kwa kubonyeza "Kukubali Vidakuzi Vyote", unakubali kuhifadhi kuki kwenye kifaa chako ili kuongeza urambazaji wa tovuti, kuchambua matumizi ya tovuti, na kusaidia katika juhudi zetu za uuzaji.
DomainData.CookieListDescription: Kidakuzi ni kipande kidogo cha data (faili ya maandishi) ambayo tovuti - inapotembelewa na mtumiaji - inauliza kivinjari chako kuhifadhi kwenye kifaa chako ili kukumbuka habari kuhusu wewe, kama vile upendeleo wako wa lugha au habari ya kuingia. Vidakuzi hivyo vinawekwa na sisi na huitwa vidakuzi vya kwanza. Pia tunatumia vidakuzi vya mtu wa tatu - ambavyo ni vidakuzi kutoka kwa kikoa tofauti na kikoa cha tovuti unayotembelea - kwa juhudi zetu za matangazo na uuzaji. Zaidi hasa, tunatumia teknolojia na teknolojia zingine za kufuatilia kwa madhumuni yafuatayo:

Groups.GroupDescription: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
Groups.GroupDescriptionOTT: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: AWSALBCORS
FirstPartyCookies.description: Kidakuzi hiki kinasimamiwa na AWS na hutumiwa kwa kusawazisha mzigo.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: AWSALB
FirstPartyCookies.description: AWS ELB maombi mzigo salio

FirstPartyCookies.Name: OptanonAlertBoxClosed
FirstPartyCookies.description: Kidakuzi hiki huwekwa na tovuti kwa kutumia matoleo fulani ya suluhisho la kufuata sheria ya kidakuzi kutoka OneTrust.  Imewekwa baada ya wageni kuona taarifa ya habari ya kuki na wakati mwingine tu wanapofunga taarifa chini.  Inawezesha tovuti kutoonyesha ujumbe zaidi ya mara moja kwa mtumiaji.  Kidakuzi kina maisha ya mwaka mmoja na hakina taarifa binafsi.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: XSRF-TOKEN
FirstPartyCookies.description: Kidakuzi hiki kimeandikwa ili kusaidia na usalama wa tovuti katika kuzuia mashambulizi ya Ombi la Msalaba-Site.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _learn_session
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie sets a session key to know whether a user is logged in or logged out.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: OptanonConsent
FirstPartyCookies.description: Kidakuzi hiki huwekwa na suluhisho la kufuata kidakuzi kutoka OneTrust. Inahifadhi habari kuhusu makundi ya vidakuzi tovuti hutumia na ikiwa wageni wametoa au kuondoa idhini ya matumizi ya kila aina. Hii inawezesha wamiliki wa tovuti kuzuia vidakuzi katika kila kitengo kutoka kwa kuwekwa katika kivinjari cha watumiaji, wakati idhini haipewi. Kidakuzi kina maisha ya kawaida ya mwaka mmoja, ili wageni wanaorudi kwenye tovuti watakuwa na mapendeleo yao kukumbukwa. Haina habari ambayo inaweza kutambua mgeni wa tovuti.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: __cf_bm
FirstPartyCookies.description: Kidakuzi __cf_bm ni kidakuzi muhimu kusaidia Usimamizi wa Bot cloudflare, kwa sasa katika beta binafsi. Kama sehemu ya huduma yetu ya usimamizi wa bot, kidakuzi hiki husaidia kusimamia trafiki inayoingia ambayo inafanana na vigezo vinavyohusiana na bots.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: __cfruid
FirstPartyCookies.description: Cookie inayohusiana na tovuti kwa kutumia CloudFlare, inayotumiwa kutambua trafiki ya wavuti inayoaminika.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: cf_use_ob
FirstPartyCookies.description: Kidakuzi hiki kinahusishwa na tovuti zinazotumia CloudFlare.  Inatumika kuboresha nyakati za mzigo wa ukurasa na kupindua vizuizi vyovyote vya usalama kulingana na anwani ya IP ya wageni.  Haina taarifa yoyote ya kitambulisho cha mtumiaji.

Groups.GroupDescription: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: AMP
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is an Amplitude cookie used to measure website performance.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: __utmz
FirstPartyCookies.description: Hii ni moja ya vidakuzi vikuu vinne iliyowekwa na huduma ya Google Analytics ambayo inawezesha wamiliki wa tovuti kufuatilia kipimo cha tabia ya mgeni ya utendaji wa tovuti. Kidakuzi hiki kinatambua chanzo cha trafiki kwenye tovuti - kwa hivyo Google Analytics inaweza kuwaambia wamiliki wa tovuti ambapo wageni walitoka wakati wa kuwasili kwenye tovuti. Kidakuzi kina muda wa maisha ya miezi 6 na husasishwa kila wakati data inatumwa kwa Google Analytics.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: AMP_MKTG_efded8aba7
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is associated with our use of Amplitude for website analytics.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: hour_of_code
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to track unique Hour of Code session starts.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: AMP_TLDTEST
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is associated with our use of Amplitude for website analytics.

FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: This cookie is set by the Google Analytics and is used to calculate new and returning visitor statistics.  The cookie lasts for 2 years by default and distinguishes between users and sessions.
FirstPartyCookies.Name: __utma
FirstPartyCookies.description: Hii ni moja ya vidakuzi vikuu vinne iliyowekwa na huduma ya Google Analytics ambayo inawezesha wamiliki wa tovuti kufuatilia tabia ya wageni na kupima utendaji wa tovuti. Kidakuzi hiki hudumu kwa miaka 2 kwa chaguo-msingi na hutofautisha kati ya watumiaji na vikao. Ilikuwa ni mahesabu ya takwimu mpya na zinazorudi wageni. Kidakuzi kinasasishwa kila wakati data inapotumwa kwa Google Analytics. Maisha ya kidakuzi yanaweza kuboreshwa na wamiliki wa tovuti.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: AMP_MKTG
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is associated with Amplitude and is used for website performance.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _gat_UA-
FirstPartyCookies.description: Hii ni kidakuzi cha aina ya muundo kilichowekwa na Google Analytics, ambapo kipengele cha muundo kwenye jina kina nambari ya kipekee ya utambulisho wa akaunti au tovuti inayohusiana nayo. Inaonekana kuwa tofauti ya kidakuzi cha _gat ambacho hutumiwa kupunguza kiasi cha data iliyorekodiwa na Google kwenye tovuti za kiwango cha juu cha trafiki.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _gid
FirstPartyCookies.description: Jina hili la kidakuzi linahusishwa na Google Universal Analytics. Hii inaonekana kuwa kidakuzi kipya na kama ya Spring 2017 hakuna habari inapatikana kutoka Google.  Inaonekana kuhifadhi na kusasisha thamani ya kipekee kwa kila ukurasa uliotembelewa.

FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is associated with our use of Amplitude for website analytics.

FirstPartyCookies.description: Vidakuzi vya Google Analytics

FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: To generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the Service
FirstPartyCookies.Name: _ga
FirstPartyCookies.description: Jina hili la kidakuzi linahusishwa na Google Universal Analytics - ambayo ni sasisho kubwa kwa huduma ya google inayotumiwa sana ya uchanganuzi. Kidakuzi hiki hutumiwa kutofautisha watumiaji wa kipekee kwa kugawa nambari inayozalishwa kwa nasibu kama kitambulisho cha mteja. Imejumuishwa katika kila ombi la ukurasa katika tovuti na kutumika kuhesabu mgeni, kikao na data ya kampeni kwa ripoti za uchambuzi wa tovuti.  Kwa default imewekwa kuisha baada ya miaka 2, ingawa hii inabinafsishwa na wamiliki wa tovuti.

FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: This cookie is set by the Google Analytics and determines new sessions and visits.  It expires after 30 minutes. The cookie is updated every time data is sent to Google Analytics. Any activity by a user within the 30 minute life span will count as a single visit, even if the user leaves and then returns to the site. A return after 30 minutes will count as a new visit, but a returning visitor.
FirstPartyCookies.Name: __utmb
FirstPartyCookies.description: Hii ni moja ya vidakuzi vikuu vinne iliyowekwa na huduma ya Google Analytics ambayo inawezesha wamiliki wa tovuti kufuatilia tabia ya wageni na kupima utendaji wa tovuti. Kidakuzi hiki huamua vikao vipya na kutembelea na kuisha baada ya dakika 30. Kidakuzi kinasasishwa kila wakati data inapotumwa kwa Google Analytics. Shughuli yoyote na mtumiaji ndani ya muda wa maisha ya dakika ya 30 itahesabika kama ziara moja, hata kama mtumiaji ataondoka na kisha anarudi kwenye tovuti. Kurudi baada ya dakika 30 kuhesabu kama ziara mpya, lakini mgeni anayerudi.

FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: This cookie is set by the Google Analytics and is used to calculate new and returning visitor statistics.   It is not used in most sites but is set to enable interoperability with the older version of Google Analytics code known as Urchin.  In this older versions this was used in combination with the __utmb cookie to identify new sessions/visits for returning visitors.  When used by Google Analytics this is always a Session cookie which is destroyed when the user closes their browser.
FirstPartyCookies.Name: __utmc
FirstPartyCookies.description:
Hii ni moja ya vidakuzi vikuu vinne iliyowekwa na huduma ya Google Analytics ambayo inawezesha wamiliki wa tovuti kufuatilia tabia ya wageni na kupima utendaji wa tovuti. Haitumiwi katika tovuti nyingi lakini imewekwa ili kuwezesha ushirikiano na toleo la zamani la msimbo wa Google Analytics unaojulikana kama Urchin.  Katika matoleo haya ya zamani hii ilitumiwa pamoja na kidakuzi cha __utmb kutambua vikao vipya / ziara kwa wageni wanaorudi.
Inapotumiwa na Google Analytics hii daima ni kidakuzi cha Kipindi ambacho huharibiwa wakati mtumiaji anafunga kivinjari chao. Ambapo inaonekana kama kidakuzi cha kuendelea ni hivyo uwezekano wa kuwa teknolojia tofauti kuweka kidakuzi.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: __utmt
FirstPartyCookies.description: Kidakuzi hiki huwekwa na Google Analytics.  Kulingana na nyaraka zao hutumiwa kutupa kiwango cha ombi la huduma - kupunguza ukusanyaji wa data kwenye maeneo ya juu ya trafiki. Inachina baada ya dakika 10

Groups.GroupDescription: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
Groups.GroupDescriptionOTT: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

Groups.GroupDescription: These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.

Groups.GroupDescription: We use a marketing database management program (Pardot - part of Salesforce) that deploys a cookie when a user interacts with marketing communication such as a marketing email.  This cookie may collect personal information such as your name, which pages you visit on our website, how you arrived at our website, etc.  It helps us provide the most relevant information to our users.

Cookies.thirdPartyDescription: Kikoa hiki kinamilikiwa na Google Inc. Ingawa Google kimsingi inajulikana kama injini ya utafutaji, kampuni hutoa bidhaa na huduma mbalimbali. Chanzo chake kikuu cha mapato hata hivyo ni matangazo. Google inafuatilia watumiaji sana kupitia bidhaa na maeneo yake, na teknolojia nyingi zilizoingia katika mamilioni ya tovuti duniani kote. Inatumia data iliyokusanywa kutoka kwa huduma hizi nyingi ili wasifu wa maslahi ya watumiaji wa wavuti na kuuza nafasi ya matangazo kwa mashirika kulingana na maelezo kama hayo ya riba pamoja na kupanga matangazo kwenye maudhui kwenye kurasa ambapo matangazo ya wateja wake yanaonekana.
Cookies.Name: NID
Cookies.description: Kikoa hiki kinamilikiwa na Google Inc. Ingawa Google kimsingi inajulikana kama injini ya utafutaji, kampuni hutoa bidhaa na huduma mbalimbali. Chanzo chake kikuu cha mapato hata hivyo ni matangazo. Google inafuatilia watumiaji sana kupitia bidhaa na maeneo yake, na teknolojia nyingi zilizoingia katika mamilioni ya tovuti duniani kote. Inatumia data iliyokusanywa kutoka kwa huduma hizi nyingi ili wasifu wa maslahi ya watumiaji wa wavuti na kuuza nafasi ya matangazo kwa mashirika kulingana na maelezo kama hayo ya riba pamoja na kupanga matangazo kwenye maudhui kwenye kurasa ambapo matangazo ya wateja wake yanaonekana.

Cookies.thirdPartyDescription: Kikoa hiki kinamilikiwa na Zendesk. Kikoa hiki hasa kwa kampuni inahakikisha kuwa vipengele vyote vya Zendesk na utendaji vinaongezwa kwenye tovuti kwa usahihi.

Cookies.thirdPartyDescription: Kikoa hiki kinamilikiwa na Eventbrite shirika la msingi la Marekani ambalo hutoa huduma za uhifadhi wa tukio na tiketi, zote nje ya tovuti yake na kupachikwa katika tovuti zingine. Sera ya faragha ya Eventbrite inamaanisha kuwa ina haki ya kutumia data iliyokusanywa kwa madhumuni ya masoko na matangazo.

Cookies.thirdPartyDescription: YouTube ni jukwaa linalomilikiwa na Google kwa ajili ya kuhudhuria na kushiriki video. YouTube inakusanya data ya mtumiaji kupitia video zilizoingia kwenye tovuti, ambazo zinajumuishwa na data ya wasifu kutoka kwa huduma zingine za Google ili kuonyesha matangazo yaliyolengwa kwa wageni wa wavuti katika tovuti zao na tovuti zingine.
